TopicTitle: Suddenly strange marker in the middle of screen appears, then Map Mode won´t work

Articles.Content:
Dear Forum,

suddenly KSP stopped running properly. It started with a strange marker in the middle of the screen. After this the Map Mode cannot be accessed any more.

Have You ever seen this?

 

Also exiting the game will not work. There is only a black screen but the loading button on the lower right is running and the cursor can still be moved.

Even loading an older saved game on a different computer brings up the same bug.

I tried a new installation of the game and of the mods via ckan. But the problem is still there.

 

I don´t have absolutely no idea, what is causing the issue. Maybe You have?

 

I´m looking forward for every help! Thank You in advance!

 

Dacemotion

 

My System:

KSP: 1.7.3.2594 Windows 10 64bit via Steam

Problem: As mentioned above.

Mods installed:

Aviation Lights (AviationLights 1:v4.0.8)
Chatterer (Chatterer 0.9.96)
Chatterer Extended (ChattererExtended 0.6.2)
ClickThrough Blocker (ClickThroughBlocker 0.1.7.2)
Collision FX (CollisionFX v4.0)
CollisionFX-Updated (CollisionFXUpdated 0.8.3.1.1)
Community Category Kit (CommunityCategoryKit 4.3.0.0)
Community Resource Pack (CommunityResourcePack 1.2.0.0)
Contract Configurator (ContractConfigurator 1.27.1)
Docking Cam (DockingCamKURS 1.3.6.2)
Docking Port Alignment Indicator (DockingPortAlignmentIndicator 6.8.3)
Docking Port Sound FX (DockingPortSoundFX v2.1.12)
Engine Lighting Relit (EngineLightRelit 1.6.1.1)
Environmental Visual Enhancements (EnvironmentalVisualEnhancements 2:EVE-1.4.2-2)
GPP HighRes clouds (GPPCloudsHighRes 1.6.3.1)
HullcamVDS Continued (HullcamVDSContinued 0.1.13)
Kerbal Engineer Redux (KerbalEngineerRedux 1.1.6.0)
Kerbal Improved Save System (KerbalImprovedSaveSystem v2.4.0)
Kerbal Planetary Base Systems (KerbalPlanetaryBaseSystems v1.6.9)
Module Manager (ModuleManager 4.0.3)
PlanetShine (PlanetShine 0.2.6.1)
PlanetShine - Default configuration (PlanetShine-Config-Default 0.2.6.1)
RasterPropMonitor (RasterPropMonitor 1:v0.30.6)
RasterPropMonitor Core (RasterPropMonitor-Core 1:v0.30.6)
SCANsat (SCANsat v18.13)
scatterer (Scatterer 2:v0.0540)
scatterer - default config (Scatterer-config 2:v0.0540)
scatterer - sunflare (Scatterer-sunflare 2:v0.0540)
SmokeScreen - Extended FX Plugin (SmokeScreen 2.8.5.0)
Toolbar (Toolbar 1:1.7.22.2)
Toolbar Controller (ToolbarController 1:0.1.8.2)
Tracking Station Evolved (TrackingStationEvolved 4.1)
Trajectories (Trajectories v2.2.3)
Transfer Window Planner (TransferWindowPlanner v1.7.1.0)

Reproduction steps:

Resume a game or load an older one, then go to Tracking Station, select a vessel and fly it. Then the strange marker appears and the game can´t be stopped any more

Log:

Output_log.txt: https://we.tl/t-av8FM4ydRf

Edited August 26, 2019 by Dacemotion

I found out which Mod is causing the problem:

It is the Transfer Window Planner by TriggerAu

I started with a new installation and added one mod after another via CKAN. After the installation of Transfer Window Planner the marker again appeared.

After removing Transfer Window Planner everything works fine.

Same problem.

Same (temporary) solution: Uninstall and wait for this *invaluable tool* to be updated.

For now, I'll go back to this: https://alexmoon.github.io/ksp/
